header.placeholder: Enter a video/playlist URL to add to the queue

progress.completed: Download complete – {n} item downloaded. | Download complete – {n} items downloaded.
progress.ready: Ready to download! {n} item queued. | Ready to download! {n} items queued.

cookies.legendLabel: Use logged in sessions from a cookies file or import from your browser.

file.label: Load cookies from a cookies.txt file
file.hint: In order to export your cookies to a file {link}

browser.label: Automatically load cookies from a browser:
browser.placeholder: Do not load cookies from a browser
browser.hint: Some browsers may not support loading cookies. See the {link}

credentials.title: Advanced methods
credentials.description: Use methods like basic auth, bearer tokens, headers, video password, etc.

basicAuth.legendLabel: Used for sites with simple authentication.

videoPassword.legendLabel: Provide a password to access protected videos.

bearerToken.legendLabel: Provide a bearer token to access private resources.

init.title: Secrets store not enabled
init.description: In order to use advanced authentication methods, the secrets store needs to be enabled.
init.hint: The secrets store uses your system's keyring, this might require a password.

error.title: Unable to enable the secrets store
error.description: An error occurred while enabling the secrets store, please try again.

toasts.error: Unable to initialize the secrets store: {error}

metadata.sizeInfo:
The amount of data that will be downloaded.
Not the final size of the file.

done.undeterminedLocation: Download location could not be determined for this item.

enable.legendLabel: Choose how subtitles should be retrieved when downloading media.
enable.label: Enable subtitles
enable.hint: Download subtitle files alongside your media.

autoGenerated.label: Include auto-generated subtitles
autoGenerated.hint: Download automatically generated subtitles in addition to creator provided ones.

format.legendLabel: Select your preferred subtitle format. If the format is not available, the next best format will be used.
format.label: Format

embed.label: Add subtitles track:
embed.hint: Add subtitles to the video file, this works for mp4, mkv and webm formats.

languages.legendLabel: Pick the subtitle languages to download.
languages.searchHint: Tip: Use the search box to quickly filter the list. Selected languages stay highlighted.

downloadDir.label: Download location
downloadDir.hint: Click in the box to select where videos get downloaded to.

directory.legendLabel: Select how downloads get organised in folders.

videoDir.label: Download location:
videoDir.hint: Override the global download location when downloading videos.

audioDir.label: Download location:
audioDir.hint: Override the global download location when downloading audio.

filename.legendLabel: Select the filename that downloads will have.

restrictFilenames.label: Restrict filenames:
restrictFilenames.hint: Replaces spaces with underscores and removes special characters like "&" from filenames.

performance.legendLabel: Configure how many system resources are used.

splitPlaylistThreshold.label: Split playlists into separate videos when:

input.legendLabel: Choose how you start downloading with OVD.

autoFillClipboard.label: Automatically fill in copied links:
autoFillClipboard.hint: Detect links you copied, so you can download them with one click.

preferVideoInMixedLinks.label: Prefer single video for playlist links:
preferVideoInMixedLinks.hint: When a link contains both a video and a playlist, download only the video instead of the full playlist.

globalShortcuts.label: Enable shortcuts:
globalShortcuts.add_hint: Add videos to the queue with:

authentication.label: Log in to download private videos:

output.legendLabel: Configure what kind of files get downloaded.

addThumbnail.label: Add cover image:
addThumbnail.hint: Embed the thumbnail inside the file so media players can display artwork.

addMetadata.label: Add title & artist info:
addMetadata.hint: Save metadata such as title, uploader/artist and description inside the file.

policy.label: Conversion mode:
policy.hint: If the downloaded file doesn't already match your selected format, it may need to be converted. Skip conversion: fastest, may ignore your chosen format. Convert if possible: tries to change the container without re-encoding. Convert if needed: always uses the selected format, but is slower and uses more CPU.

format.label: Audio format:
format.hint: Choose the preferred audio format. Conversion mode decides whether the file will actually be converted.

container.label: Video format:
container.hint: Choose the preferred video format. Conversion mode decides whether the file will actually be converted.

appearance.legendLabel: Configure how the application looks and feels.

network.legendLabel: Configure how the application connects to the internet.

impersonate.label: Impersonation:
impersonate.hint: Impersonate a specific OS or browser, to prevent fingerprinting.

sponsorBlock.legendLabel: Remove or mark parts of a video.

removeParts.label: Parts to remove
removeParts.placeholder: Select 1 or more parts to remove from the video.

markParts.label: Parts to mark
markParts.placeholder: Select 1 or more parts to mark with a chapter.

sponsor.label: Sponsor
sponsor.description: Paid product or service promotion by creator or third-party.

selfpromo.label: Self-Promo / Unpaid
selfpromo.description: Creator’s own promotion of merch, services or channels (unpaid).

interaction.label: Interaction Reminder
interaction.description: Reminders to like/subscribe/follow or interact with the creator.

intro.label: Intro / Intermission
intro.description: Intro animation, intermission or non-content pause at the start.

outro.label: Outro / Endcards / Credits
outro.description: End cards, credits or closing segment near the end.

hook.label: Hook / Greetings
hook.description: Narrated trailers for the upcoming video, greetings and goodbyes.

music_offtopic.label: Non-Music Section
music_offtopic.description: Bits of talking or distractions in videos with music.

preview.label: Preview / Recap
preview.description: Preview of upcoming content or recap of previous segments.

filler.label: Filler / Tangents
filler.description: Tangents, jokes or filler scenes not required to understand the main content.

chapter.label: Chapter
chapter.description: Marks a chapter/section of the video (used with chapter action type).

update.legendLabel: Choose which parts of the app should update automatically.

updateBinaries.label: Automatically update tools:
updateBinaries.hint: OVD uses tools like yt-dlp and ffmpeg to download videos. Enable this to keep them up to date.

updateApp.label: Automatically update the app:
updateApp.hint: Turn this on to receive new features and bug fixes as soon as a new version is released.

system.legendLabel: Configure how this application integrates with the system.

hint.mac: Shows a menu bar icon for quick access.
hint.generic: Shows an icon in the system tray for quick access.

minimiseToTray.label: Minimize to tray on close
minimiseToTray.hint: Closing the window hides the app in the system tray instead of quitting.

autoStart.label: Start at login
autoStart.hint: Launch Open Video Downloader automatically when you sign in.

label.windows: Start minimized to tray at login

hint.mac: When the app starts at login, it won’t open a window. Use the menu bar or Dock icon to open it.
hint.windows: When the app starts at login, it will start in the system tray without opening a window.
hint.generic: When the app starts at login, it won’t open a window.

behavior.label: Show notifications:
behavior.hint: Tip: notifications can be useful when using the app with shortcuts.

title.failed: Failed to install some required tools.

subtitle.failed: The app may not work as expected, please report this.

emptyState.title: Your queue is empty
emptyState.subtitle: Add some videos to get started.

dragState.title: Drop to add to queue
dragState.subtitle: Add to the queue by dragging videos.

toolCard.failed: Failed to install this tool. Expand for more information.

internal.message: An internal error occurred while processing this item.

signInRequired.message: You need to sign in to view this content.

membersOnly.message: This video is only available to channel members.

geoBlocked.message: This content isn’t available in your region.

accessForbidden403.message: You don’t have permission to access this resource (HTTP 403).

notFound404.message: The requested video or playlist could not be found (HTTP 404).

server5xx.message: A temporary server issue occurred. Try again later.

rateLimited429.message: Too many requests were sent. Please wait and retry.

requestedFormatUnavailable.message: The selected format isn’t available for this video.

unableToExtractInitialData.message: Couldn’t extract the required initial video data.

unableToExtractIdOrInfo.message: Failed to extract video or uploader information.

nsigExtractionFailed.message: Failed to extract or decode the video signature.

embedOnly.message: This video can only be accessed through an embedded player.

urlUnsupported.message: The provided link isn’t supported or recognized.

unknownUrlType.message: The provided URL uses an unsupported protocol.

networkNameResolutionFailed.message: Couldn’t resolve the host name. Check your internet connection.

unableToConnectToProxy.message: Unable to connect to the proxy. Check your proxy settings.

playlistPrivateOrMissing.message: This playlist is private or no longer exists.

videoNotFoundOrPrivate.message: This video was removed or set to private.

channelUnavailable.message: The channel hosting this content is no longer accessible.

ffmpegNotFound.message: Transcoding to mp3 or mp4 requires ffmpeg.

ffmpegFailed.message: FFmpeg encountered an error during processing.

cannotAllocateMemory.message: FFmpeg ran out of memory while processing the video.

permissionDenied.message: The app doesn’t have permission to access this file or folder.

windowsFileMissing.message: The referenced file could not be found (WinError 2).

blockedGeneric.message: This video is blocked and cannot be downloaded.

copyrightClaimed.message: The video was blocked due to a copyright claim.

notPremieredYet.message: This video isn’t available until its premiere begins.

livestreamNotStarted.message: The livestream hasn’t started yet. Please check back later.

sslVerifyFailed.message: The secure connection could not be verified. Check your certificates or date/time.

sponsorBlockUnreachable.message: Couldn’t connect to the SponsorBlock API for segment data.

downloadRetryingFragment.message: A fragment download failed and will be retried automatically.

unknown.message: An unknown error occurred while processing this item.
